alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 2:46PM CDT until April 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 15 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Koochiching County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake area. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
